description: The ultimate Silvia. The S15 Spec-R arrived at the end of an era — the last of a lineage that defined drift culture from Osaka to Nova Pacifica. Lighter, stiffer, and more powerful than any Silvia before it, the S15 is a chassis that communicates through your fingertips.
lore: Never officially sold in America. That's what makes finding one in Nova Pacifica so special — and so expensive. Every S15 in the city has a story about how it got here, and none of those stories are boring.
